snippet: There's online anger in China about the dispute over islands claimed by China, Japan and Taiwan. But what was drawing more of the mainland's attention on the Internet? The tale of a killer's girlfriend.
abstract: There's online anger in China about the dispute over islands claimed by China, Japan and Taiwan. But what was drawing more of the mainland's attention on the Internet? The tale of a killer's girlfriend.

headline.main: Chinese Anger Diverted by the Saga of a Hoodlum's Girlfriend
